scripts.clean: rm -rf functions-build && mkdir functions-build && rm -rf functions/{submission-created,current-standings}/node_modules && rm functions/current-standings/candidates.js
scripts.zip-submission: cd functions/submission-created && yarn install && zip -r submission-created.zip *
scripts.zip-current: cp functions/candidates.js functions/current-standings && cd functions/current-standings && yarn install && zip -r current-standings.zip *
scripts.zip: yarn run zip-submission && yarn run zip-current
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run zip && yarn run copy-raw-js && yarn run parcel build pages/*.html
